transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji bhaiya boliye.
Executive: Ji good evening Jugal Kishore ji se baat ho rahi hai.
Customer: Kishore Dahu ji.
Executive: D Lightning and Home Decor Pankaj baat kar raha hu sir relationship manager India Mart se kaise hai sir?
Customer: Achcha hu sir.
Executive: Apne customer care number pe call aaya tha sir usi regarding maine call kiya tha.
Customer: Ha call kya tha actually mere ko membership ke liye band karna hai usi ke regarding main aapko call kiya tha.
Executive: Aapko band close karwana hai sir aapka account.
Customer: Ji ji close karna hai.
Executive: Lekin lekin close kyu karwana hai sir aapka to payment ek saal ka ho rakha hai yaha pe.
Customer: Aapka matlab kuch matlab response nahi aa raha hai kuch matlab nahi hai jo bhi aapka ho raha hai mere ko payment refund kar dijiye.
Executive: Kishore ji aapko kisne bola ki aapka jab account aap close karwayenge payment refund hoga aapka.
Customer: Bhaiya main khud bol raha hu.
Executive: 30 days ka 30 days ka ek policy hota hai aapka initial 30 days mein.
Customer: Actually bhaiya dekhiye kya hai na matlab main na maro kya 6 mahina kya ek bhi lead aaya nahi hai jaisa follow up bole the waisa main follow up kiya sab kuch aapko.
Executive: Maine check kiya hai sir aapne last aapne last 90 days mein.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Last teen mahine mein sir aapne.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Bata deta hu aapne last teen mahine mein jo total lead consume kiya hai.
Executive: September total mila ke 7 10 11 12 13 13 to lead consume kiya sir aapne total teen mahine mein to kaise convert hoga sir bataiye ek ek week mein aapko malum hai kitna lead milta hai sir.
Customer: Teen.
Executive: Sir per day mein teen.
Customer: Ha to ek week mein kitna lead milta hai 17.
Executive: Ek week mein 17 milta hai aur apne teen mahine mein sir 13 lead consume kiya hai.
Executive: To kaise aap expect kar rahe ho sir.
Customer: Sir dekhiye matlab kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai kuch matlab nahi hai na main apna payment.
Executive: Main wahi batana chah raha hu ji main samajh raha hu aapka aapka payment aapka one year ka payment hua hai Kishore ji main aapko wahi samjha raha hu.
Customer: Mera baat suniye bhaiya.
Customer: Main invest kiya hu thik hai.
Customer: Invest jo kiya hu agar wo paisa hi nahi aayega mere pass to invest karne ke kuch fayda hi nahi hai na.
Customer: Ab main to pehle hi bola tha.
Executive: Koi baat kar rahe ho aap bol rahe ho ki ek gadi maine purchase kar li payment de kar ke ab wo road pe chal nahi rahi hai hai na lekin wo aapko kar rahe ho ki average nahi de rahi hai.
Customer: Dekhiye actually kya dekhiye jo client ab main manufacturer nahi hu pehle to main bola hua tha main dealer hu.
Executive: Main Kishore ji aapko wahi clear karna chah raha hu ki company in sab ke liye aapko kahin bhi lag sakta hai India Mart mere liye work nahi kar pa raha mere liye beneficial nahi hai 30 days ka aapko company time deti hai.
Customer: Aisa kuch page aap update kijiye jo ki mera kuch fayda ho paye aap update kijiye fir.
Executive: Main aapko wahi to bol raha hu Kishore ji uske liye uske liye dekhiye hamari team ne aapne pehle bhi baat kiya hua hai services ko lekar ke thik hai.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Aur aapka catalog hamari taraf se bilkul correct aur bilkul secure sahi kiya hua catalog quality score maintain but aapki taraf se hame chota sa support ye chahiye ki din ka do se teen lead aapko consume karna hi hai sir.
Executive: Jab tak aap consume karke customer se baat nahi karenge sir aapko business nahi milega customer se baat karne hi padega sir aapko business ke liye.
Executive: Aur jab aap ye start karenge properly to aapko samne se bhi customer ka call aur message aana start hoga sir abhi main dekh raha hu aapko customer ka koi call nahi aaya isi wajah se kyuki aap bilkul inactive hai aapka profile sir.
Executive: Aapne last 30 days mein even ek din sir login kiya sirf 30 days mein ek ek valid consume kiya aapne last 30 days mein.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To kaise hoga.
Customer: Delhi se aate hai sir Delhi wale saman lete nahi to kya karunga sir bataiye.
Executive: Main main aapko solution deta hu Kishore ji.
Customer: Odisha ke aapka to main to baat karne ke liye ready rehta hu Odisha.
Executive: Main main solution main solution nahi de raha hu Kishore ji maine isiliye samne se aapko call kiya solution dene ke liye maine call kiya aapko.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Dekhiye aapka product hai jaise ceiling fans ho gaya LED lights ho gaya hai na panel lights ho gaya ya pedestal fan ho gaya modular plates ho gaya ye sab product hai aapka thik hai din mein lead kitna consume karna hota hai sirf do se teen aapko kitna kis location se chahiye aapko chahiye man lijiye Odisha se hai na aisa hi hai na ab man lijiye jaise main open kar leta hu aapka dekhiye aapka maine profile open kar liya aur minimum order value kya hai aapka.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Minimum order value hoga na kuch aapka ya single piece bhi kar denge delivery.
Customer: Single order single order ha mil jayega.
Customer: Bhaiya ek client aaya main baad mein baat karta hu.
Executive: Koi nahi main line pe hu aap koi nahi unko kar lijiye.
Customer: Nahi thoda time lagega bhaiya.
Executive: To aap mujhe ek kaam kijiye number note kijiye sir aap.
Customer: Main aapko call kar dunga aapka number.
Executive: Aapko lagega nahi na sir call mere ko is number pe shayad not reachable jayega kyuki ye system ke through call ho raha hai to aap number note kar lijiye mera.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: 98
Customer: 98
Executive: Zero
Customer: Zero
Executive: 3737
Customer: 3737
Executive: 784
Customer: 784 thik hai bhaiya.
Executive: Ha please abhi main 6 baje tak office mein hi hu aap 6 baje se pehle free hoke mere ko ek bar connect kijiye main taki aapko bata bhi du hai na aur system pe rahenge to aur better rahega sir hai na taki proper discuss kar paye.
Customer: Okay thik hai aap kariye mere ko ek bar call.
Executive: Ha.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to close membership and get refund.

- Claims no leads in six months.

- Delhi clients don't buy products.



Resolution:

- Explained 30-day refund policy.

- Clarified lead consumption is low.

- Offered to help with lead consumption.

- Executive shared his direct number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call the executive before 6 PM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, membership, buyleads, lead consumption
